model.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovableEntity, StaticEntity

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    An entity is any object in the game world. They are represented as a RawModel and TexturedModel which gives the model a shape and texture.
    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949, Divya Patel - 300304450
